item.description:
Mark your calendar....
Saturday September 8
1:00 pm - 7:00 pm

Wachusett Mountain Ski Area
Bring your blankets and lawn chairs for a great day of exciting music on the mountain featuring some of the finest in local, regional and national performers. Great food, brews, a variety of vendors and our scenic stage area make this the best concert for all music fans.
Current artist lineup:
http://wawa.wachusett...

Doors open at 12:30. Children 5 and under Free!
MusicFest Admission Ticket required to access SkyRide
ADVANCE TICKETS: ORDER TICKETS ONLINE!
http://secure.wachuse...
Admission Adult: $10.00 $15 at the gate
Admission Junior ( 6-12): $5.00
Sky Ride Adult: $6.00
Sky Ride Junior (6-12): $4.00

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: 10th Annual Wachusett Music Festival
